query1: Select p.ucid from emcparty.c_b_party p, emcparty.c_b_addr a where p.INTERACTION_ID = a.INTERACTION_ID and p.HUB_STATE_IND = a.HUB_STATE_IND and p.ucid is not null and p.HUB_STATE_IND=1 and p.inter_company_type LIKE '%EXTERNAL' and a.POSTAL_CD is not null order by dbms_random.value FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
